<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">
    <title>Custom Landing Page</title>
    <style>
        /* General Reset */
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        body {
            font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            color: #f4f4f4; 
            background-color: #000; 
        }

        /* Header Styling */
        header {
            background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 0;
            position: fixed;
            width: 100%;
            top: 0;
        }

        header nav ul {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            list-style-type: none;
        }

        header nav ul li {
            margin: 0 15px;
        }

        header nav ul li a {
            color: #fff;
            text-decoration: none;
        }

        header nav ul li a:hover {
            text-decoration: underline;
        }

        /* Home Section */
        #home {
            background-image: url('https://img.freepik.com/premium-photo/full-shot-travel-concept-with-landmarks_1174912-5410.jpg?size=626&ext=jpg&ga=GA1.1.891939900.1697978745&semt=ais_hybrid'); /* Your uploaded image */
            background-size: cover;
            background-position: center;
            color: #fff;
            height: 100vh;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column; 
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            text-align: center;
            padding-top: 60px;
            position: relative; }

        #home .intro {
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1; 
            padding-top: 80px; 
        }

        #home .intro .main-image {
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            width: 80%; 
            height: auto;
            z-index: 0; 
            margin-bottom: 20px;         }

        #home .intro h1 {
            font-size: 48px;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
        }

        #home .intro p {
            font-size: 18px;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
        }

        #home .button {
            background-color: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 5px;
            font-size: 18px;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
        }

        #home .button:hover {
            background-color: #555;
        }

        /* Section Styling */
        .section {
            padding: 50px;
            text-align: center;
            background-color: #111; 
            margin: 20px 0;
        }

        /* Services Section */
        .service-boxes {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-around;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }

        .service-box {
            background-color: #222; 
            padding: 20px;
            border: 1px solid #444;
            width: 30%;
            margin: 15px;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .service-box img {
            width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 10px;
        }

        .service-box h3 {
            margin: 15px 0;
        }

        /* Contact Form */
        form {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
        }

        form input, form textarea {
            width: 300px;
            padding: 10px;
            margin: 10px 0;
            background-color: #333; 
            color: #f4f4f4; 
            border: 1px solid #555;
        }

        form button {
            padding: 10px 20px;
            background-color: #4CAF50;
            color: #fff;
            border: none;
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        form button:hover {
            background-color: #333;
        }

        /* Footer Styling */
        footer {
            background-color: #111; 
            color: #fff;
            padding: 20px;
            text-align: center;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

    <!-- Header Section -->
    <header>
        <nav>
            <ul>
                <li><a href="#home">Home</a></li>
                <li><a href="#about">About</a></li>
                <li><a href="#services">Services</a></li>
                <li><a href="#contact">Contact</a></li>
            </ul>
        </nav>
    </header>

    <!-- Main Section -->
    <section id="home">
        <div class="intro">
            <img src="/path/to/your/image.jpg" alt="Main Image" class="main-image"> <!-- Added Image -->
            <h1>Welcome to THE TOURS AND TRAVELS</h1>
            <p>Explore our services and feel free to contact us.</p>
            <a href="#about" class="button">Learn More</a>
            <a href="#services" class="button">Our Services</a>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- About Section -->
    <section id="about" class="section">
        <h2>About Us</h2>
        <p>We are a company committed to delivering the best services in the industry.</p>
    </section>

    <!-- Services Section -->
    <section id="services" class="section">
        <h2>Our Services</h2>
        <div class="service-boxes">
            <div class="service-box">
                <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="Service 1 Image"> <!-- Updated image -->
                <h3>Economy package</h3>
                <p>We offer an all-in-one economy package.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="service-box">
                <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="Service 2 Image"> <!-- Updated image -->
                <h3>Mid package</h3>
                <p>This includes mid-luxury services in the economy package.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="service-box">
                <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="Service 3 Image"> <!-- Updated image -->
                <h3>Luxury package</h3>
                <p>We provide an ultra-luxury package with all integrated services.</p>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Contact Section -->
    <section id="contact" class="section">
        <h2>Contact Us</h2>
        <form action="#" method="post">
            <input type="text" name="name" placeholder="Your Name" required>
            <input type="email" name="email" placeholder="Your Email" required>
            <textarea name="message" placeholder="Description" required></textarea>
            <button type="submit">Submit</button>
        </form>
    </section>

    <!-- Footer Section -->
    <footer>
        <p>&copy; The Tour ND Chill. All rights reserved.</p>
    </footer>

</body>
</html>
